ComicInfo.Summary: Devil's in the Details Part 6: Falling in Place: The Question's underlying plans take shape as he takes down the Subterraneans and foils Luthor's agenda for the Science Spire. Superman is disgusted by The Question's violent tactics and kicks him out of Metropolis.

ComicInfo.Title: Devil's in the Details Part 6: Falling in Place
